forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. E winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
